Articles.Content:
I have a problem with the green overlay not appearing on my parts when I click on them. They can't change color. Also some parts can't be clicked on after they have been placed (probably a collision mesh issue). Any help?

http://www.sendspace.com/file/we0q00

(the version is 0.21.1)
Are you using .DAE or .mbm for model files? If you're using .dae, you'll have to send them through unity and turn them into .mbms to be compatible with 0.20+.
Yes, I'm using .dae. Okay then, here we go, mr. Unity.
